description: I. Letter dated 09/08/2007 from Nick Herbert MP to Jack Straw MP regarding Computer National Offender Management Information System (C-NOMIS) delivery within original costings. 3 p. II. Letter dated August 2007 from Jack Straw MP to Nick Herbert MP regarding C-NOMIS. 2 p. III. Contract between the Home Office and Electronic Data Systems Limited for the Quantum project. [3 very large documents].
